name: Outerbase Studio
title: outerbase.com
shortDescription: Outerbase Studio is an open-source GUI client designed for managing databases such as SQLite, MySQL, and Postgres. It allows users to add, filter, and edit database rows with ease, utilizing tools like the foreign key picker and row detail sidebar. Ideal for developers and database administrators, it supports organizing SQL files, editing table schemas, and combining code with queries in notebooks. Expected to release in early 2025, it's perfect for startups and enterprises aiming to streamline database management.
pros: Integrates code and queries in notebooks

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: DBeaver
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Supports various databases and is open-source.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: HeidiSQL
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Free, open-source with a focus on MySQL.
